title: SUBTITLES SUBS Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K
description:
SUBTITLES SUBS Mystery Science Theater 3000 MST3K

PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNTIL READING THE FOLLOWING

THESE FILES ARE NOT VIDEOS

THEY ONLY CONTAIN SUBTITLES FROM MST3K EPISODE DVD RIPS

THEY ARE BEING POSTED TO ALLOW MUXING WITH OTHER VIDEO/AUDIO SOURCES

If you don't know what these are or you think it'd be too difficult to synch them, please simply download the complete mkv files with all the video and audio tracks.

These subtitles are being provided by request in case someone wants to synch them with their own encodes of the MST3K episodes. These mks files are Matroska containers with NO VIDEO and NO AUDIO; they only have the English subs for each episode. An mks can be muxed using MKVmerge with a user provided video/audio encode. The remux might require synch adjustment which can be easily applied within MKVmerge. Removing every "ONLY-" from the mks filenames results in the filenames for the complete mkv encodes.

Note, these ARE NOT OCRed srt text subtitles. These are the original Advanced Sub Station Alpha (aka SSA) subtitles directly muxed from the DVDs.

This initial subtitles share contains the following mks files. These are all of the MST3K episode subtitles up to Volume36. Vol02 was a reissue and they didn't do subs for Vol33 or Vol34.

113.TheBlackScorpion.Vol30.DVDrip.ONLY-subs.mks
